title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Principal Victoria's office, day. Her door opens.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: You wanted to see me, Principal Victoria?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yes, Mr. Garrison. Have a seat.  Mr. Garrison, sometime ago you asked to be promoted from teachng kindergarten back to the third grade.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I'm aware of that.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I wanna come clean with you and tell you that back then some of us were uncomfortable with your sexual preferences. It was wrong of us, and I want to make it up to you.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Wow, that's... really great to hear.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: As you know, the position of Fourth Grade teacher has become available, and we'd like to offer YOU the job.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh, for real? You're not kidding?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: We in administration see now that you are an individual with your own preferences, and we respect that.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Hoh, this is all just... this is a dream come true!  Thank you, Principal Victoria! I'll do a great jub!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I know you will.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: You're sure this is for real? I mean, I'm not gonna just get fired again for being gay tomorrow.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: It's for real, Mr. Garrison.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh-ho, great!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: With all the new laws we could never fire you for being gay now. You'd be able to sue us for millions of dollars.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Right uh-  Wha- ...what was that?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well, I was just saying that the policies have really changed. You know, we fire you for acting gay next time, you'd be able to sue the school district for ...lots of money.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: ...Oh right, right, right, I... Huh-... how much money, exactly?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh. Well, there was the case out in Minnesota where the guy was awarded... 25 million, I think.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeh-you don't say.  Well thanks, uh, Principal Victoria.  Holy Moley! I've gotta find a way to get fired for being gay!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: South Park Elementary

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: M'kay kids, I know the past few weeks have been really hard with the death of your teacher, Ms. Choksondik.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Funny.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: BUT... the principal has finally hired a teacher to take her place. So I want you all to give your best behavior to your new Fourth Grade teacher, Mr. Garrison.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: AWWWW!!!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Not him!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Thank you, Mr. Mackey.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Good luck, m'kay.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Okay, children, now for those of you whoare new, my name is  Mr. Garrison.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Where is Mr. Hat, sir?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well, I was informed that fourth graders are a little too old for Mr. Hat.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Two-year-olds are too old for Mr. Hat.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: But it's okay because I found a new teacher's assistant. Say hello to... Mr. Slave.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Hi kids. Hm.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: So that's  Mr. Slave.  The teacher's assitant.  Or, as I like to write for short, the Teacher's Ass.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh Jesus Christ.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Okay, Mr. Slave. Go sit until I need you.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ugh.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Dude, I think that Mr. Slave guy might by a...  Pakistani.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I'm not saying the rest of the school year will be easy. In fact, it's going to be long and hard.  Really long and really hard.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh Jesus Christ.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Eheh, the first thing we're gonna be learning about is communist Russia.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No, Kenny. What are you doing, Kenny?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Now, Stalin was a big silly when it came to...

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Kenny, no! Don't do it, Kenny!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Eric, did you just throw a paper airplane?!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No, it was Kenny!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Very funny, Eric! Kenny's dead!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah, but Cartman drank Kenny's remains, and now Kenny's soul is trapped in Cartman's body.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That does it! I will not put up with foolishness in my class! It's time for punishmenmt!  Take it Mr. Slave!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh-oh. Oh it hurts.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I will  NOT put up with  TOMfoolery in my  CLASSroom, children.  Mr. Slave, put this rubber ball in your mouth. Take that, Slavey! take it!  This'll get me fired for sure.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: The Marsh house, afternoon. The Tweeks, the Stotches, the Marshes, the Broflovskis, and Liane are present in the living room, seated around the coffee table.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I really enjoyed the imagery in the last chapter of this month's book.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yes, and I really saw the entire book thematically as a take on corporate America.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well I think in the fourth chapter, when uh Nancy Drew discovers the bloody glove in the cheerleader's locker, well that uh that was just a brilliantly written passage.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: So full of metaphor.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Hey guys, can we talk to you?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh, hi boys.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: How was school?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Uhh, not cool.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That's great. We're having our book of the month club meeting, so why don't you boys go outside and play?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Was it me, or did you all think that Nancy Drew solved the riddle of Elephant Mountain a little too easily?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No, no, he said not cool. We got our new teacher today; it's, it's Mr. Garrison, our old third grade teacher.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Uh huh.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well, he has this new teacher's assistant, and uh and they're both... totally gay.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Kyle! You know better than to discriminate against homosexuals!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah but, these guys are really super-gay.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Aw I'm surprised at you, Stanley. I really thought you knew how to accept people for what they were.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah, but Dad-

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No buts, Stanley! We're not raising our kids to be discriminators!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That's right! I think it's time you kids took a little trip to the Museum of Tolerance!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Museum of Tolerance, next day. A really modern building with a fountain by the entrance. The five boys and their parents arrive at the museum

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Welcome to the Museum of Tolerance. Here we try to educate you on the dynamics of racism and prejudice in America.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ey!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Now, did you know that words we use can show intolerance?  Let's begin our tour with a walk through our Tunnel of Prejudice, to show you what it can feel like to be discriminated against.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: QUEER. BEANER. CHINK. NIGGER. HEEB. FAGGOT. CRACKER. SLOPE.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Aw man, this is awesome!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Now you know how it feels.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I wanna ride again! I wanna ride again!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: We are now entering the Hall of Stereotypes. These wax figures represent how some intolerant people have labled minorities. Here we see a black person eating chicken and watermelon, a stereotype that hurts the African-American community. What other stereotypes do you see here?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ah, here's the Arab as a terrorist.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That's right. But of course, we know that all Arabs are terrorirsts, don we, kids?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: W-w-well there's an Asian over there with a calculator.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That's right. Not all stereotypes are negative. But even a positive one like "All Asians are good at math" is harmful to society.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Look, a covetous Jew!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Very good, young man. The idea that Jews are only interested in money is very old indeed.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ah, here's a good one.  It's the stereotypical "sleepy Mexican."

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Wai-what? Oh man, what time is it?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh I'm sorry. I thought you were a wax sculpture.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Naw, man. I'm the janitor. I'm s'pose to be cleaning but I'm so tire. Ongh, so sleepy.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: This is our discovery wing. Take your time at the computer displays , because you see, being tolerant you must also respect people who are small, people who are disabled, even people who are overweight,  like this young man here.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ey!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: You other boys have probably called this young man names like "tubby," or "lardbutt," or "fat tits,"...

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: "Fat tits." That's a good one.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah, I have to remember that.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: But you must learn to be tolerant of his differences as well. If he chooses to eat fatty foods, that's his life choice.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I'm not fat, I have a different life choice.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: And we won't belittle you for eating lots of cookies and cakes and pies.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Duhuhude, tolerance kicks ass!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That's our Cartman.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Museum of Tolerance, outside.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well, that's the end of our tour.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Now do you see why tolerance is so important, boys?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I guess.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: We have to accept people for who they are and what they like to do.  Hey! What the hell are you doing?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh I was just uh-

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: There's no smoking in the museum!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: But I'm not in the museum.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Get out of here, you filthy smoker!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah, dirty lungs!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Go ahead and kill yourself, stupid tar-breath!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Dumbass!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Get out of here!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well, have a great day, everybody.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Now you boys can go and give your teacher and assistant the respect they deserve. Right?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: South Park Elementary, day, Garrison's class. Mr. Garrison enters, having previously set up a chemistry experiment on the teacher's desk.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Okay, children, let's take our seats. Uh, apparently, none of you tried to get me fired yesterday, so I guess we're just gonna have to go on and learn more today.  Now who can tells me what happens to water when we heat it up in the Bunsen burner?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: It evaporates.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Good, Butters. Now if we take the glass tube of the Bunsen burner, we can also see how other things react.  Evaporation is an exothermic reaction, so let's look at an endothermic one. Mr. Slave, position 7 please.  Now I'm gonna put the glass tube under Mr. Slave's tight ass.  The heat from Mr. Slave's ass will act as our new conductor of energy

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: AAH.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Okay, now Butters, could you bring over Lemmiwinks for me please?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Sure.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh, no, noo, no no no no.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Newton was the first to discover that for every action there's a reaction - thank you Butters. Now what do you think is gonna happen when I introduce the element of the gerbil to the endothermic heat of Mr. Slave's ass?  Well let's see.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: AAH.  AAH.  Dude! Jesus Christ! AAH!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Lemmiwinks? NO!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: South Park Elementary, lunch time. The kids go for their lunches

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Hello there, children!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Hey Chef.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: How's it goin'?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Bad.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Why bad?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Chef, we're intolerant.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: ...Intolerant of who?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Gays, I guess.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Now why do you wanna go be intolerant of gay people, children?  I thought you knew better.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well we didn't think we were, but Mr. Garrison has this new assistant, and we're really uncomfortable around him.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Children, a lot of times the reason get uncomfortable around gay people is that they have some issues themselves. You have to ask yourself, "What is it about their behavior that, for some reason, makes me unconfortable?"

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well, I guess it's mostly the way Mr. Garrison stuck a gerbil up Mr. Slave's ass.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Right. And you see, children, that's why you need to- Whoa! What?!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Are we homophobes now?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: We don't wanna be gaybashers, Chef.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Children, there's a BIG difference between gay people and Mr. Garrison! Do you understand that??

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: N-no?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: You children just take your lunches. I'm gonna have a talk with the principal.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I'll take three lunches today, please.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: You don't need three lunches, Eric! You're fat enough as it is!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: It is my life choice, Chef, and if you
text: don't tolerate it I'll report you to the SEC.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Fourth Grade classroom. The chemistry equipment has been cleared away from the teacher's desk. Mr. Garrison and Mr. Slave are in the classroom

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That was a brilliant idea, having me put a gerbil up your ass, Mr. Slave. Now we'll get fired for sure!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well it wasn't the first small animal I put up my ass.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Mr. Garrison to the principal's office, please?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That's it! They're gonna fire me for being gay! Twenty-five million here we cooome.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Don't forget, I get half. Oooooh!  Oooooh, Jesus Christ.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Lemmiwinks, you must find a way out of this place, or you will surely die. This way has been closed off by the Great Sphincter. To escape you must journey upward to the dark reaches of the intestine and past the stomach. Who am I? Just a friend. Heed my words, Lemmiwinks. Your time is running out. Make for the large intestine. All will be made clear then.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: A great adventure is waiting for you ahead.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: Hurry onward, Lemmiwinks, or you will soon be dead.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: The journy before you may be long and filled with woe

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: But you must escape the gay man's ass so your tale can be told.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: The principal's office, a few moments later. Mr. Garrison hums as he nears the office door. He enters and stands beside an angry Chef, who has crossed his arms.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: You wanted to see me, Principal Victoria?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh yes, uh, Mr. Garrison, have a seat

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh dear, sounds like I'm gettin' fired.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Mr. Garrison, Chef has brought it to my attention that some uh students are a bit... uuuncomfortable about certain aspects of your teaching meathods.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh no, you're firing me? Oh well, I can't stop being who I am. I can't help the way God made me. Guess I just have to go.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Nonono we're not firing you.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: ...You're not?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No, we're sending Chef to a tolerance seminar.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Sending Chef to a tolerance seminar?! You've got to be fuckin' crazy!!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: You demostrate a lack of tolerance for Mr. Garrison's behavior. In fact, I believe you used the words "sick queer" to describe his conduct in class?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: He IS a sick queer!!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I just wanted to give you an opportunity to apologize to Mr. Garrison before I send you away, Chef.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Kiss my black ass!!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: South Park Elenentary, Counselor Mackey's office

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Parents, I had to call you in here because your boys have refused to attend class with their homosexual teachers, m'kay?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: We're not staying in class another minute with those queermos!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well I really thought you boys really learned something in the Museum of Tolerance, but apparently all you learned was new words to call your poor teachers!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: But they killed Lemmiwinks!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Shut your mouth, Butters! You'll speak when spoken to!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yes sir.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Mr. Mackey, we've done everything we can to raise compassionate children. We don't know where else to turn.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well there is an intensive seminar camp. It's a bit severe, but it might be the only way. M'kay?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That sounds good to me.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Mee too.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Then it's settled. Boys, you're going to tolerance camp.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Tolerance camp?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Devitzen's Tolerance Camp, black-and-white footage, day. A truck pulls up to the entrance and two guards open the gates. Beyond, kids mill around under the watchful eyes of other guards. A few moments later a guard paces in front of a crowd of kids.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Welcome to tolerance camp. You are here because you would not accept people's differences.  Because you refuse to accept the life choices of your fellow man. Well those days are now over. Here you vill verk, every hour of every day until you submit to being tolerant of everybody. Here, intolerance... will not be tolerated.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: South Park Elementary, Garrison's classroom. Mr. Slave is reading his magazine. A few moments later Mr. Garrison storms into the room and slams the door shut

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: God-damnit!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: How'd it go?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: This is unbelievable, Mr. Slave! It seems no matter what I do I can't get fired!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: The principal didn't fire you?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No! The parents felt so bad that their kids didn't want to attend my class anymore that they wanna give me the Courageous Teacher award this Friday at the Museum of Tolerance!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh, Jesus Christ.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I mean, I stuck a gerbil up your ass and they wanna give me a Goddamn medal!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well it sounds to me like the principal's just hiding things from everybody. What you need to do is let the parents see what kind of demented faggot you are.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh well-  Hey, that's right, Mr. Slave. The parents have to see for themselves. The awards ceremony! Well we'll put on a show they'll never forget!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oohoohoohoo, Jesus Christ.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Lemmiwinks journeyed a distance far and fast.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: To find his way out of a gay man's ass.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: The road ahead is filled with danger and fright

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: But push onward, Lemmiwinks, with all of your might.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Lemmiwinks, you are coming to the entrance of the small intestine. Now you must seek out the Sparrow Prince.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: The Sparrow Prince lies somewhere way up ahead.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: Don't look back, Lemmiwinks, or you'll soon be dead.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: Lemmiwinks, Lemmiwinks, the time is growing late

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: Slow down now and seal your fate.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I am the Sparrow Prince. Long has my spirit been trapped within this place. Before you lies the maze of the small intestine. One path leads to the stomach, the other to certain doom. Take with you this helmet and torch.  Let them be your guide.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Take the magic helmet torch to help you light the way.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: There's still a lot of ground to cross inside the man so gay.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: Ahead you lies adventure, and your strength still lies within.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: Freedom from the Ass of Doom is the treasure you will win.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Devitzen's Tolerance Camp, black-and-white footage, day. The kids are in a large room the size of an airport hangar. All of them have been doing arts and crafts, as they are dirty with crayons and paint. Each column of tables is being patroled by a guard.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Today we wll be using the fingerpaint! You vill make a painting that shows people of different races and sexual orientations getting along. Figerpaint. Figerpaint!  You vill not make any distinction between people of different colors! People with different sexual preferences! You vill accept everyone!  What are you fingerpainting?!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Uh, a bear?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ein bear?! Und bear has nothing to do with accepting people of different races!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Eh I, I don't know what else to paint.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Start over!  You will fingerpaint what we tell you!  GO!  Faster.  Faster! Faasterr.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Aaaa!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Faster! Are you done?! What is it?! What have you done?!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: People of all colors and creeds holding hands beneath a rainbow!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: GOOD!  That wasn't so hard, was it? NOW DO IT AGAIN!  Faster!  Faasterr!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: South Park Elementary, Garrison's classroom. Mr. Garrison talks to Mr. Slave. There are no kids in class, as they've all gone to tolerance camp, apparently

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: There! I've done it, Mr. Slave. The perfect plan to get us fired. You finished your costume design yet?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Almost. I jast have to get through a su-  Uh-huc, Jesus Christ.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: What's the matter?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Mm, Just a bit of an upset stomach, I guess.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well here, take a Pepto pill. I can't have my teacher's ass under the weather.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Eugh, Jesus Christ.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Lemmiwinks came to the stomach far.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: 'Neath the depths of the lungs and heart.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: You chose your path wisely, Lemmiwinks. I am the Catatafish.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Catatafish of the stomach's cove.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: If you answer this riddle, the esophagus will let you pass.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Catatafish riddle will soom be told.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Devitzen's Tolerance Camp, black-and-white footage, day. The kids are now in a different room quietly making macaroni pictures on the floor, but they are all fatigued. The guard walks up to a soldier on a catwalk and talks with him.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Everything in order?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yes, mein Führer. Ve are making the prisoners make macaroni pictures that illustrate diversity in the verkplace.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Eh-xcellent!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Kyle.  Kyle, you have to keep making your macaroni pictures.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Can't... glue... any... more .

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: The guards are coming, Kyle. Glue. Glue, damn you!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Take this one away. He is done for.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Butters!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No more... arts and crafts...

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Jesus... we have to get out of here.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Devitzen's Tolerance Camp, black-and-white footage, outside. The kids are at play. Cartman walks over to a Porto-Potty and enters, but stops. He looks down into the toilet and finds two girls there in the septic tank

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Please don't tell them that we're hiding here.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: We can't work anymore. We'll die.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Vhat?  Waht?!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh. Uh, nothing. I was just getting back to work.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Vhat is in there?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Nothing.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Get back to verk.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yes sir!  Phew.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Eww! Eww! Eww!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Hey, I was kidding. There's actually two girls hiding down there. Hey!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Museum of Tolerance, Friday night. The main hall is set up for the awards ceremony and the guests are seated.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Tonight we are here to honor an amazing fourth grade teacher with the Courageous Teacher award.  Herbert Garrison came out about two years ago. Since then he has faced adversity. He has even faced ridicule by some of the students.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh Randy, I'm so ashamed of our son.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: It is my honor to present the Courageous Teacher award to... Herbert Garrison.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Get along, little Slave.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh my God.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: That's what our boys were talking about?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ding-ding, ding-ding.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: He is so courageous.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Say, Mr. Slave.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yes, Mr. Garrison?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I had a dream last night that you were a real dick.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Really? Why would you dream that I was being an asshole?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No no, I was the asshole.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ogh, that is so courageous.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: What an amazing human being!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Uh, I uh I'm very happy to get this award. Uh but you know what makes me even happier? Sucking balls.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ahh

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: It isn't working. Sing your song, Mr. Slave.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I've got a little- Oof.  Ohoc, Jesus Christ. What's happening in there?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Inside Mr. Slave's stomach at that moment, Lemmiwinks has been put into a gyroscope and is ready to be shot up the esophagus and out the mouth.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Hang on, Lemmiwinks! You solved the Catatafish's riddle. Now your trials are nearly through!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Outside Mr. Slave's stomach, onstage

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh! I should have never shoved all those poor animals up my ass!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Uh...

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Courageous.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: So courageous.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: God-damnit, don't you people get it?! I'm trying to get fired here!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oh, that's courageous.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Look, this kind of behavior should not be acceptable from a teacher!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yeah, Jesus Christ.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: But the mu-se-um tells us to be to-le-rant

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yes. The mu-se-um.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: The mu-se-um tells us.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Tolerant, but not stupid! Look, just because you have to tolerate something doesn't mean you have to approve of it! If you had to like it, it'd be called the Museum of Acceptance!  "Tolerate" means you're just putting up with it! You tolerate a crying child sitting next to you on the airplane or, or you tolerate a bad cold. It can still piss you off! Jesus Tapdancing Christ!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: He's right. Our boys didn't hate homosexuals, they just hated the way this asshole was acting.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: We'ge gotta get our boys back!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Ogh! Okay, so now can I PLEASE get fired and get my 25 million dollars?!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: No, no, I think I have a better idea.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Devitzen's Tolerance Camp, Saturday, day. The boys' parents are at the front gate. Black-and-white fades into color, and Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Butters are present. They are quite thin, clearly undernourished, and their clothes fit loose on them

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: We're sorry, boys. Why didn't you tell us your teachers were acting so over-the-top?

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Yes. You boys don't know how much we suffered.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Come on, let's go.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Well this is insane!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: I'm sorry Mr. Garrison, but it's obvious you aren't tolerant of your own behavior.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Vhat do we have here? Noo recruits? I assure you, the next veek will be nothing but pain and suffering!

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Oooo, this could be kind of fun.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Lemmiwinks has made it out and his tale is nearly through

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Great job, Lemmiwinks.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: Thanks to you we are all free.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: But your adventures are just beginning, for you are no ordinary gerbil, Lemmiwinks. You are the Gerbil King.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
text: All hail the Gerbil King.

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: Now that you're the Gerbil King there's more ventures to go on

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: Fly away to faraway lands and to the setting sun

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: There's still so many enemies and battles yet to fight

title: THE DEATH CAMP OF TOLERANCE
role: For Lemmiwinks the Gerbil King could be told a thousand nights
